mapper.sql: id, name, position, have, skill_1, skill_2, skill_3, skill_4, skill_6, skill_p, skill_a, label
mapper.select: select * from `character` where name like concat('%',#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select * from `character` where ${from} != '' and ${from} like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select * from `character` where 'skill_1' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_2' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_3' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_4' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_6' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_p' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or 'skill_a' like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into character (id, name, position, have, skill_1, skill_2, skill_3, skill_4, skill_6, skill_p, skill_a) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{have,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skill1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skillP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skillA,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into character
id,
name,
position,
have,
skill_1,
skill_2,
skill_3,
skill_4,
skill_6,
skill_p,
skill_a,

#{skill4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{skillA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update character
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
have = #{have,jdbcType=INTEGER},
skill_1 = #{skill1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_2 = #{skill2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_3 = #{skill3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_4 = #{skill4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_6 = #{skill6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_p = #{skillP,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_a = #{skillA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update character set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, have = #{have,jdbcType=INTEGER}, skill_1 = #{skill1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_2 = #{skill2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_3 = #{skill3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_4 = #{skill4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_6 = #{skill6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_p = #{skillP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_a = #{skillA,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
